name: Ultimate Battle Animals
description:
A fast paced 1v1 local multiplayer shooter. Compete against your friends on over 30 levels, find the best weapon and be the last to survive.

Controls Player 1:

Move: W A S D
Shoot: Space
Pick up weapon: E

Player 2:

Move: ← → ↑ ↓
Shoot: M
Pick up weapon: N

Credits

Code: Milan Varady   

Art: Milan Varady, Marton Gabor

Animal Sprites: @emimonserrate

Music: Evan King, TeknoAXE
